drug.name: antivenin, black widow spider (latrodectus mactans) inj VIAL

drugname.value: antivenin, black widow spider (latrodectus mactans) inj VIAL

additionalnotes.value: One dose usually adequate. Recommend skin or conjuctival test be performed prior to administration of antivenin.

ahsformularystatus.value: Formulary, Health Canada Special Access Programme.
